p: Concerning the Psidium essential oil reports, 75 are in the Americas: 56 in South America, 14 in Central America, and 5 in North America. Brazil is the most reported country, with 52. Also, 20 reports came from Asia, being half in China. From Africa, 11 reports were obtained, being 4 in Egypt. Only two oils were reported in Europe (France) and Oceania (French Polynesia). The geographical distribution of Psidium specimens is shown in Figure 1 and Appendix A.
